channel.title: CSCB07 on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in CSCB07 on Notes

item.title: Lab 1
item.description: Lab 1 Notes # Due 05/22/2022 23:59 EST Handy Links: Lab Handout PDF Helpful Cheatsheet for SVN and Bash Installing Eclipse (Windows/Mac/Linux) (You don’t need to do step 4) Installing SVN SVN Repository Details # svn checkout -r 1 https://helixteamhub.cloud/UTSC/projects/tut1/repositories/subversion/lab1 # Username: cscb07 # Password: Cscb07#s22 Note: If you are trying to install homebrew on mac and the install is failing, make sure to turn off any vpn services you have, and make sure you’re using UofT Wifi.

item.title: Lab 3
item.description: Lab 3 Notes # Lab 3, Due 10/8/2021 23:59 EST Handy Links: https://www.regextester.com/ https://cheatography.com/davechild/cheat-sheets/regular-expressions/ https://www.baeldung.com/java-buffered-reader (if Scanner is not working) Valid Hashtag is: Start of file: hashtag + whitespace End of file: whitespace + hashtag Everything else: whitespace + hashtag + whitespace Note: Newlines are considered white-space (\n) Example: Line: I can't wait to fail POSt at #UofT #Boundless!

item.title: Lab 4
item.description: Lab 4 Notes # Lab 4, Due 10/24/2021 23:59 EST Handy Links: https://www.eclemma.org/userdoc/index.html https://junit.org/junit5/docs/5.0.1/api/org/junit/jupiter/api/Assertions.html Use Eclipse, donâ€™t bother with other editors Use these points for testing isEquilateral: Point p1 = new Point(0, 0); Point p2 = new Point(Math.sqrt(5), 0); Point p3 = new Point(Math.sqrt(5) / 2.0, Math.sqrt(15) / 2.0); For submission, you can name the file anything

item.title: Lab 5
item.description: Lab 5 Notes # Lab 5, Due 11/14/2021 23:59 EST Quick Links # https://developer.android.com/studio/install https://developer.android.com/training/basics/firstapp/creating-project https://piazza.com/class/kti52spsvua71f?cid=329 (For AMD CPUs) https://piazza.com/class/kti52spsvua71f?cid=336 (For M1 Mac Users) Files For Submission # Do not submit any code, only these screenshots are enough. Screenshot of the main activity (EditText with SEND button) Screenshot of the display message activity (with the message you typed earlier)
